summary: Implements a specialized diffusion pipeline that extends the standard Stable Diffusion workflow to generate panoramic (wide‑angle) images. It integrates model components such as VAE, UNet, CLIP encoders, and schedulers, while supporting optional adapters (IP‑Adapter, LoRA, textual inversion) and safety checking. The pipeline handles image preprocessing, latent manipulation, noise rescaling, and post‑processing to produce seamless panoramic outputs.
business_intent: Provide developers and content creators with a ready‑to‑use tool for producing high‑quality panoramic visuals using Stable Diffusion, facilitating applications in virtual reality, gaming, advertising, and immersive media.
